lead_paragraph: AN INCIDENT OF THE LATE GREAT FIRE AT BUFFALO.--A correspondent of The Medina Citizen, in giving an account of the late fire in this city, narrates a touching incident, in connection with that confiagration, which proved so disastrous to many of the honest and industrious:
